entry.title: An article about Optics

entry.content:
Integral de difracción

$$ E{(\mathbf{r},t)} = C \int\nolimits_{S'}^{} \left(\frac{1}{k \left|{r - r'}\right|} - i\right) \frac{e^{i k \left|{r - r'}\right|}}{\left|{r - r'}\right|} cos{(\mathbf{r - r'}, \hat{z})}\, d^{2}r', \text{ con } \hspace{2mm} C = \frac{k E_{0} e^{- i t w}}{2 \pi i} $$
